description: RAF07/001- Regional Initiative on Human Development Reports in Sub-Saharan Africa

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: The project will provide a programme framework to facilitate RBA support to the Human Development ( HD) Analysis and Reporting process in sub-Saharan Africa.  The expected outcome will be production of Regional and sub-regional HDRs and strengthened institutional capacity for HD analysis, measurement and advocacy.
subproject.title: RAF07/001- Reg. HDR

title: RAF07/001- Reg. Initiative on HDR- Sub Saharan Africa
